lead_paragraph: Chris Pizzotti passed for 232 yards and 2 touchdowns  in Harvard’s 23-7 victory over visiting Penn, setting up the Crimson’s showdown with Yale for the Ivy League championship.
snippet: Chris Pizzotti passed for 232 yards and 2 touchdowns  in Harvard’s 23-7 victory over visiting Penn, setting up the Crimson’s showdown with Yale for the Ivy League championship.
